fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance readability and modern aesthetics, catering to a professional tone with a touch of creativity.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts prioritize readability with clear distinctions between headings, body text, and code elements.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles, ensuring a clear visual structure for different content types.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial for headings provides a clean and modern look, contrasting well with the serif Georgia for body text. Mono and sans-serif fonts are used strategically for code, titles, buttons, and navigation.
